title: US-Iran tensions: Pakistan to be a part of Turkey-led peace talks
summary_full: Pakistan has been invited to crucial talks in Turkey between Iran and the US, aimed at de-escalating regional tensions. Several other regional powers, including Saudi Arabia and Qatar, are also expected to attend. The discussions are anticipated to focus on Iran's nuclear program, with both sides expressing cautious optimism for a deal, though Iran warns of war if negotiations fail.
